    • Uses of Item in Item

      Subclasses of Item in Item 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ArmorItem
      ArmorItems extends Item and has a instance variabel for a defence rating.
      class  LifeItem
      LifeItem extends Item and gives life (potion or a heart).
      class  MoneyItem
      MoneyItem extends Item and has a instance variabel for money value.
      class  WeaponItem
      WeaponItem extends Item and has two instance variables for a attack damage and a attack speed.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Returns a clone of this item
